page.title: 03FARMING
page.content: First we went to a farm and the farmer took us round.He took us to a field that had barley in it. It grows about three to our feet high and he feeds it to cattle and they also use it to make beer. This is winter barley. Then we went back to a tick bean field, he feeds this to the pigeons. There were six acres and they get Â£180 per tonne. Then we went into a tritikale field, you feed animals on this and you can make bread with this. Then we went into another field with winter oats which they harvest in October.
